languages.text: {n}Как только вы завершаете фразу, Инквизитор надавливает на клинок и вырезает вам на лбу какие-то символы. В ту же секунду вы чувствуете как по телу разносится агония, — словно выпитая вода обратилась в священный огонь, выжигающий ростки скверны в вашей душе один за другим.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Инквизитор вырезает символ на лбу, вода жжется изнутри.{/n}

languages.text: {n}As soon as you finish the sentence, the Inquisitor presses down on the blade and carves some symbols into your forehead. You instantly feel agony spread through your body — as though the water you drank has turned into a holy fire that is burning out the roots of corruption in your soul, one by one.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Как только вы завершаете фразу, Инквизитор надавливает на клинок и вырезает вам на лбу какие-то символы. В ту же секунду вы чувствуете как по телу разносится агония, — словно выпитая вода обратилась в священный огонь, выжигающий ростки скверны в вашей душе один за другим.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As soon as you finish the sentence, the Inquisitor presses down on the blade and carves some symbols into your forehead. You instantly feel agony spread through your body — as though the water you drank has turned into holy fire that's burning the sprouts of corruption in your soul one by one.{/n}

You instantly feel agony spread through your body — as though the water you drank has turned into holy fire that's burning the sprouts of corruption in your soul one by one.{/n}

You instantly feel agony spread through your body — as though the water you drank has turned into a holy fire that is burning out the roots of corruption in your soul, one by one.{/n}

{n}As soon as you finish the sentence, the Inquisitor presses down on the blade and carves some symbols into your forehead. You instantly feel agony spread through your body — as though the water you drank has turned into a holy fire that is burning out the roots of corruption in your soul, one by one.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你刚刚说完这句话，大审判官的匕首就刺了下来，在你的额头上刻下了某种符号。你立刻感觉浑身上下传来了尖锐的刺痛，就好像你刚刚喝下的水变成了神圣之火一样，将你灵魂中的腐化萌芽尽数烧毁。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you finish the sentence, the Inquisitor presses down on the blade and carves some symbols into your forehead. You instantly feel agony spread through your body — as though the water you drank has turned into a holy fire that is burning out the roots of corruption in your soul, one by one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你刚刚说完这句话，审判官的匕首就刺了下来，在你的额头上刻下了某种符号。你立刻感觉浑身都充满了痛苦，就好像你刚刚喝下的水变成了神圣之火一样，将你灵魂中的腐化萌芽尽数烧毁。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたが喋り終えると同時に、異端審問官は刃を押しつけて、あなたの額にシンボルを彫りはじめる。その瞬間、体中に苦痛が広がった。まるで体内に入れた水が聖なる炎に変わり、魂の腐敗の種を一つ一つ燃やしつくしているようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you finish the sentence, the Inquisitor presses down on the blade and carves some symbols into your forehead. You instantly feel agony spread through your body — as though the water you drank has turned into a holy fire that is burning out the roots of corruption in your soul, one by one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが喋り終えると同時に、異端審問官は刃を押しつけて、あなたの額にシンボルを彫りはじめる。その瞬間、体中に苦痛が広がった。まるで体内に入れた水が聖なる炎に変わり、魂の腐敗の種を一つ一つ燃やしつくしているようだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tan pronto como terminas la frase, el Inquisidor presiona la hoja y graba algunos símbolos en tu frente. Sientes que la agonía se extiende por todo tu cuerpo al instante, como si el agua que habías bebido se hubiera convertido en un fuego sagrado que estuviera quemando las raíces de la corrupción.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you finish the sentence, the Inquisitor presses down on the blade and carves some symbols into your forehead. You instantly feel agony spread through your body — as though the water you drank has turned into a holy fire that is burning out the roots of corruption in your soul, one by one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tan pronto como terminas la frase, el Inquisidor presiona la hoja y graba algunos símbolos en tu frente. Sientes que la agonía se extiende por todo tu cuerpo al instante, como si el agua que habías bebido se hubiera convertido en un fuego sagrado que estuviera quemando los brotes de la corrupción.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kaum hast du den Satz vollendet, drückt der Inquisitor die Klinge in deine Haut und ritzt dir Symbole in die Stirn. Du spürst augenblicklich, wie sich der Schmerz in deinem Körper ausbreitet — als hätte sich das Wasser, das du getrunken hast, in ein heiliges Feuer verwandelt, das die Wurzeln der Verderbnis in deiner Seele verbrennt, eine nach der anderen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you finish the sentence, the Inquisitor presses down on the blade and carves some symbols into your forehead. You instantly feel agony spread through your body — as though the water you drank has turned into a holy fire that is burning out the roots of corruption in your soul, one by one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kaum hast du den Satz vollendet, drückt der Inquisitor die Klinge in deine Haut und ritzt dir Symbole in die Stirn. Du spürst augenblicklich, wie sich der Schmerz in deinem Körper ausbreitet — als hätte sich das Wasser, das du getrunken hast, in ein heiliges Feuer verwandelt, das die Sprossen der Verderbnis in deiner Seele verbrennt, eine nach der anderen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À peine avez-vous prononcé ces mots que l'inquisiteur appuie sur la lame et se met à graver des symboles sur votre front. Votre corps tout entier tremble tant la douleur est atroce, comme si l'eau que vous avez bue s'était soudain transformée en un feu purificateur qui brûle une par une toutes les racines de corruption implantées dans votre âme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you finish the sentence, the Inquisitor presses down on the blade and carves some symbols into your forehead. You instantly feel agony spread through your body — as though the water you drank has turned into a holy fire that is burning out the roots of corruption in your soul, one by one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À peine avez-vous prononcé ces mots que l'inquisiteur appuie sur la lame et se met à graver des symboles sur votre front. Votre corps tout entier tremble tant la douleur est atroce, comme si l'eau que vous avez bue s'était soudain transformée en un feu purificateur qui brûle une par une toutes les graines de corruption implantées dans votre âme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Engizisyoncu, cümleni bitirir bitirmez bıçağı derine batırıp alnına bazı semboller çiziyor. Bedenine yayılan acıyı anında hissediyorsun. Sanki içtiğin su kutsal ateşe dönüşmüş de yozluğun, ruhuna yayılmış köklerini bir bir yakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you finish the sentence, the Inquisitor presses down on the blade and carves some symbols into your forehead. You instantly feel agony spread through your body — as though the water you drank has turned into a holy fire that is burning out the roots of corruption in your soul, one by one.{/n}
